sqlMap.insert: MERGE INTO WISHLIST A USING DUAL ON(A.CONT_TITLE = #cont_title# and A.USERS_ID = #users_id#) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (WISH_NO, USERS_ID, WISH_RGS_DT, CONT_TITLE) VALUES (WISH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #users_id#, SYSDATE, #cont_title#)
sqlMap.select: select ROWNUM AS wish_no ,b.CONT_POSTER as cont_poster ,a.CONT_TITLE as cont_title from WISHLIST a join CONTENT b on a.CONT_TITLE = b.CONT_TITLE where users_id=#users_id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE USERS_ID = #users_id# AND CONT_TITLE = #cont_title#
